about_the_game:
Wild Shot: Animal Saviour – Protect, Rescue, and Defend the Wild!

Step into the world of Wild Shot: Animal Saviour, a vibrant and action-packed sniper adventure where you take on hunters and free captured animals. Set in a lush, living jungle, every shot you take helps restore balance to nature. With colorful landscapes, dynamic challenges, and creative gameplay, it’s a rescue mission like no other!

Rescue, Explore, Protect
The jungle is full of surprises - hidden traps, roaming hunters, and clever distractions designed to slow you down. Equipped with a sniper rifle, RPGs, and tranquilizer darts, you'll navigate thick forests, misty swamps, and sunlit clearings to outsmart poachers and free the animals. But stay sharp - some hunters set fake animals as decoys, while others use smoke grenades to cover their tracks!

Ever-Changing Challenges
No two missions are the same! Some levels take you deep into dense forests, while others lead you to wide-open savannas or mysterious caves. Day and night cycles keep things exciting, affecting visibility and enemy movement. Keep an eye out for moving vehicles transporting captured animals - hit the right target to stop them in their tracks!

Creative and Fun Gameplay
Precision sniping, clever traps, and interactive environments make every level unique. Shoot open supply crates for bonus ammo, use tranquilizer darts to have animals fight back, and set off explosive chain reactions by targeting hidden TNT. Unlock power-ups, rescue rare species, and discover fun surprises as you progress.

A Jungle Waiting for a Hero
More than just a sniper game, Wild Shot: Animal Saviour is an adventure filled with heart and strategy. Its mission is to protect nature. Plan your approach, free the animals, and take down poachers in the most creative ways possible. Are you ready to embark on this wild rescue mission?

A Battle for the Wild
The fate of the captured animals is in your hands. Plan your attacks, outsmart the hunters, and prove that one skilled shooter can make a difference in the fight for wildlife. So, ready to take the shot? Your mission is clear: eliminate the poachers, outsmart their deadly tactics, and set the animals free. Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate saviour of the wild? The hunt begins now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 (Compatibility) or macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 or Later
  • Processor: M1 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

name: Wild Shot: Animal Savior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
